DOC.detailed_description: Rationale Although fertility success rate rise due improve technique patient usually highly motivate first visit clinic , dropout rate high . Research show fertility treatment cause physical , psychological economic burden . Objective The aim study examine rate patient drop type subfertility work treatment . Furthermore , investigator want determine reason discontinuation identify demographic characteristic couple prognostic factor drop assessment treatment fertility clinic . Study design Prospective cohort study fertility centre Isala ( Zwolle - The Netherlands ) , Erasmus University Centre ( Rotterdam- The Netherlands ) , St Elisabeth Hospital ( Tilburg - The Netherlands ) IVF Centre Voorburg ( Voorburg - The Netherlands ) . Study population Every couple undergoes type work treatment subfertility problem visit clinic yet . Methods Patient record include couple study included patient ask fill validate questionnaire evaluation work treatment . The data put database analyse . First visit ( Q1 ) EPQ-RSS , SCREENIVF , MMQ , FertiQoL , demographic question ( 128 item ) Evaluation ( Q2 ) FertiQoL , HADS ( 48 item ) Evaluation > 4-6 cycle non-IVF ( Q3 ) FertiQoL , HADS ( 48 item ) Evaluation > 3 cycle IVF ( Q4 ) FertiQoL , HADS ( 48 item ) Dropout ( Q5 ) FertiQol , SCREENIVF , MMQ , PCQ-infertility , reason dropout ( 128 item )
